Reviews.Title: Good bag, other items are average
Reviews.Author: TXBuyer
Reviews.Content: The camera bag is quite good and spacious. The camera stand is not very good. The legs are very weak and dont have the strength or setup to balance any reasonable sized SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Good starter kit
Reviews.Author: D. C Robertson
Reviews.Content: The bag and card reader are the best items in this kit. The tripod is just ok and has limited usability, but it was essentially free so not a big deal. If you plan to travel much, this bag my not be sufficent for protecting your expensive equipment. If you're looking for a light, backpack style bag to carry on you for the day, this is a good deal.
